QuestData.Title: A Show of Faith
QuestData.Description:
<Torcali's voice enters your mind.>
I have watched your efforts from afar, small thing. You have made mistakes, and one of my young has suffered for it.
I do not forget, but I can forgive.
<The enormous direhorn touches the offering bundle with her nose.>
As my people place faith in me, I place my faith in you. Take my blessing to my child and she will wake.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Blessed Offering to your direhorn hatchling in Warbeast Kraal.

Objectives.Objective: Deliver Torcali's Blessing to your direhorn
